title: Traditionalism is also sometimes called Perennialism. Traditionalism is a school of thought based upon a belief in a universal, objective religion. Some key Traditionalist influences include René Guénon, Frithjof Schuon, Ananda Coomaraswamy, Titus Burckhardt

Non-conformists were French thinkers of the 1930s
